"The carafes opening is just wide enough to get your hand inside for cleaning. I think it should only be used to boil water and it works perfectly fine for me. About five seconds after it reaches maximum boil it shuts itself off. The carafes design is very elegant and nice. Handle stays perfectly cool even with repeated use... If youre the sort of person who takes delight in nicely designed and functional items youre going to like this."
It is a quick and simple product to use. Heats up VERY quickly and the blue is also a pretty color too, easily noticeable when it turns off. Makes morning and afternoon tea much less of a hassle.
Easy to use and clean. Love the style. I have this displayed on my coffee bar next to a box of teas and it gets attention from guests more than anything else.

This is truly a lovely, well-founded, and impressive kettle. The design is luxurious and one of a kind, and the automatic shut off feature is very convenient, because I can leave the kitchen while it is boiling and not have to worry about anything setting a light. The best part about this kettle, though, is the amount of time it takes to boil the water. It happens so quickly I still cannot believe it to this day.
I saw this when I was in a hotel in Borneo this summer...I love the blue light, speed of heating, size - the whole thing!  Very happy with this purchase!
Love this Mueller water heater tea kettle...it’s gorgeous to look at and quickly heats up water also turns itself off automatically I recommend it highly

"The reason I give 5 stars is simply for Muellers outstanding customer service.  Within a month of buying the kettle, it began turning off before boiling, then turning on later, spontaneously.  Bit dangerous.  We assumed there was something wrong with the thermostat.  Wrote to Mueller, had a reply within minutes, and a product replacement within days.  Outstanding, love the replacement kettle, works perfectly."

reviews.reviewTitle: Easy to use and works well.
reviews.reviewText: "I use this several times everyday.  Its fool proof and works well.  If you dont like cleaning it too much, use filter water like I do."

reviews.reviewTitle: 3 months later still works and looks like new
reviews.reviewText: Boils a lot of water fast. Not sure what else to say., Glass stays clean and the plastic’s color hasn’t faded yet after months of daily use.

reviews.reviewTitle: Fastest water boiler in the west......east north and south...
reviews.reviewText: Great product this boils water faster than anything I have ever used. I plug it in get my cup of tea ready and it’s ready to go. Love it

This kettle is one of the most beautiful kettles that I have ever owned! I love the light and it heats the water up so well and quickly. It looks great on the counter top and compliments my house interior very well. I am able to save on time and energy any time I want hot water and the price is downright unbeatable! It is lightweight, too so if I need to remove it from the table, then it is not a hassle.
Purchased as a gift for a bridal shower. Absolutely loved the design so bought one for myself. Cool light, heats up fast and not too loud. Definitely recommend.
Great product and does exactly what it says it does. I wish there was a way to adjust the temperature, but overall a great product.

I like how fast it heats the water and I love the materials that it’s made from BPA free was a huge factor for me . I really like the Blue LEDs as well it gives a really cool effect on my counter . Overall I am very pleased with the product it’s made well it’s safe and it’s an attractive kettle . I highly recommend it .

This kettle is the most beautiful kettle I have ever laid eyes on. It has such a classic and elegant look to it that will last throughout the years. It is the perfect size, as well, being big enough to hold the amount of water that I need, but not being too big.  Another perk is that it is not super heavy, so I can move it without effort. I truly love it and am very satisfied with my purchase of it.

was looking for an electric kettle that was made in Germany...saw this one from Mueller that said “Mueller Austria” on the box...ordered it....got an electric kettle made in china....silly me!....what was I thinking for the price...was going to return but after investigating much higher priced models ,I found them to be imported  as well, Anyway still seems to be a good kettle...heats fast. A little bigger than expected., ‘

reviews.reviewTitle: So much faster than my stovetop kettle!
reviews.reviewText: "I have been using this electric kettle for 4 days now and it boils water so much faster than my old stovetop kettle would.  I enjoy the blue lights and hearing the kettle boil is much easier.  Plus my boys can turn it on for me when Im still upstairs.  Overall give this 5 stars and am looking forward to enjoying it."
I love this kettle! It is so FAST , and I like to turn the lights off while I’m boiling water because it is such a beautiful hue of blue. Love!
This reasonably priced electric kettle is comparable to any of the more expensive brands.  A great product for an affordable price.

reviews.reviewTitle: "Quickly heats water, made me retired the ol stove kettle"
reviews.reviewText: I normally clean it with dish soap, or a vinegar/water mixture for descaling calcium and hard water. The mouth of it is too small to fit most hands, but a brush will do.

The cover does not opens completely in order to fill or clean...I understand the steam risk, so this doesn’t bother me. It’s easily filled using the spout. I rinse it occasionally but it boils water so it doesn’t really getting dirty., The blue light is pretty while it heats up.
Excellent product. Heats water quickly. Automatically turns off when temp is reached and turns off when water is empty.

reviews.reviewTitle: Super fast and easy to use!
reviews.reviewText: I love this water kettle!  It is super fast and easy to use.  I have to admit, the blue light is pretty cool 😎 too!  I do wish the opening was a little bigger so it’s easier to clean, but this is a small inconvenience compared to how much I like the kettle!
For the lovers of a good French press coffee or a nice cup of tea this is the product for you. Reaches temperature quickly and is easy to clean. Good value for your money.

reviews.reviewTitle: Nice tea and coffee addicts toolset!
reviews.reviewText: Perfect addition to my mother’s tea and coffee drinking habit!  Quick and easy not water and looking forward to some hot cider too!

Beautiful, quick and easy to use.  I could not believe how fast water boils in this kettle.  The auto shut-off feature works well too.  The blue lights accent your boiling water then turn to clear as the water reaches the desired temperature.  I would buy it again and recommend this product.
We’ve had an earlier version of this and like this as much. Our only question will be if it is durable as our last one lasted only 5 years.
More than I expected -- this item feats in 2 or less minutes, Wish the top was wider- cleaning could be easier

Simple cheap and effective. Looks good and blue led is nice touch. Heats water. Have fun and watch water boil, which is at least as exciting as reading through Amazon reviews. If u read this far just put it in your cart.
"Worth the price. I was floored by how fast it brought the water to a boil. Dont bother leaving the room to do anything else."

My wife and I were looking for a new water heater to replace our old one. I saw this one on Amazon and decided to order one. It has awesome design! Has very good quality! Brings the water to boil very fast! I also like the stylish light! Recommend to everyone!
I ruined my paula dean sauce pan when i walked away from it while steeping 2 cups of tea on stove top ,wont do that again with this gem

reviews.reviewTitle: Easy to use, easy to clean, and fast
reviews.reviewText: Easy to use, easy to clean, and fast water boiling! Perfect time for winter months when you crave hot drinks all day.
This water heater is sleek looking and easy to use. I love using it for tea or hot chocolate during the week.
This hot water kettle lives up to the hype.  I love how quickly it heats--and especially love that it shuts itself off when heated.
Super easy to use, looks Great! Very modern. A bit noisy while water is boiling but over all works great

reviews.reviewTitle: It makes the water go bloopy-bloop.
reviews.reviewText: This electric kettle imparts thermal energy to dihydrogen monoxide in an efficient manner.  And it looks really cool while doing it thanks to those blue lights.  Very easy to use and exactly as pictured.

"This has been a great purchase. I use it for many things. It has come in specially handy for heating up my babys milk bottle. I love that I do not need to wait over 10 minutes for the pot on the stove to begin boiling. It probably takes 3 minutes total for the entire kettle to boil and be ready to use. I even use it to sanitize my babys toys and other things that he puts in his mouth."

reviews.reviewTitle: So glad I found this pitcher!
reviews.reviewText: Great product; water boils quickly and pitcher is easy and comfortable to use. Quality obviously high.

First time getting this style of tea kettle, after my daughter has ruined three stovetop kettles ny boiling them beyond dry :/ This kettle boils water quickly to enjoy a nice cup of tea with in a few minutes. Only downside, you cannot get inside the carafe to clean. Love everything else about it though
Works great for my morning tea. It gets up to temperature in about a minute. Easy to use and easy to clean. Worth the money.

I did a lot of researching before purchasing this pot, because our old pot had lasted 8 years and served us very well. This is a worthy replacement, with the added touch of visible boiling AND blue lights. Great pot!

reviews.reviewTitle: Easy to use, heats up fast
reviews.reviewText: I bought this to use in my counseling classroom, it heats up fast and is easy to use. Very happy with the product.
For some reason my sisters love using this - we’ve been whipping up a bunch of hot chocolate lately
Great hot water pot. I wanted glass so I could see if it was really clean. Hate hard water spots!

The design of this kettle is so unique and by far one of the most expensive and impressive looking kettles that I have ever come across. And not only, does it look great, it also performs outstandingly well. It heats up the water insanely fast. I was so shocked the first time I used it. I could not believe the amount of time it took to boil! It is the fastest kettle I have owned.

"This thing works flawlessly. Its nicely designed and its beautiful. Heats water fine and is all glass and stainless where it touches the water. I use bottled water in mine because our water is very hard. The handle stays cool and the outside of the glass gets warm but not super hot. It boils water really fast and its much easier and faster than the microwave. Good purchase."
Nice to be able to quickly boil water! Will have to see how it lasts over time but I’m happy for now

I love my electric kettle! It can be a bit bothersome to clean but we have been so happy with it and have used it 4-5 times a day since getting it. We drink tea and coffee daily and I have started using it for my instant oatmeal.

reviews.reviewTitle: Not as functional as I would have liked.
reviews.reviewText: I use this every day. I wish that the lid would open wider or come off. It is difficult to fit it under the faucet. The lid is also difficult to unlock. It has a button at the top with a plastic fastener that takes 2-3 times sometimes to open.. Other than that, it holds a lot and heats well.
I love my tea pot  it heats the water for my tea supper fast and looks elegant on my counter.
Love this! Super fast boiling. Great quality. Works as expected. So happy I purchased this.
The only thing I dont like about thos product is how loud it gets. Other than that everything else is great.
"Works fast, the blue light is cool. Havent had to clean it yet bc I use filtered water."

This is the finest quality kettle that I have owned. It is so well made and much better than the average kettle on the market today. Not only does it look amazing, but it also performs amazingly. I use it multiple times a day and it never fails to bring me nice, hot water within record time. The LED light is so cool and it makes it look really fancy.
I am very pleased with my Electric Water Kettle.  It does the job quite well.  No complaints at all.

reviews.reviewTitle: Way faster than using a stove
reviews.reviewText: Water boils fast! Love the blue LED lights! It’s faster than boiling water on a stove.
I bought Electric Kettle because it had so many 5 stars. Looks beautiful on the counter. I am pleased, with my purchase.
Haven’t had this kettle for long but I love it. Heats up fast, quiet, and pretty!
Super good quality kettle. Head up water really easily and I like that you can see the water inside. The clear outside looks really nice and sleek. The filter on the spout is a nice touch as well.
Beautiful, especially when turned on and has a blue glow. Heats quickly. Comfortable handle, easy to pour- no splashing.

This is a pretty attractive looking small appliance, and heats up water fast - almost instant if you only need a small amount of water. I have a weird adversion to microwaves, and would rather use this than a kettle on a stove.

reviews.reviewTitle: Really good, easy to tell its on, way better than an amazon basics one I had before.
reviews.reviewText: Really good, easy to tell its on, way better than an amazon basics one I had before.

"Works as described and looks good with blue light! Takes a little longer to boil water than what Im familiar with but can get used it. I had the product for a week and love it so far. I would recommend this product and brand!"
"Purchased this for my father-in-laws 93 birthday and he loves it. It is easy for him to use and he likes the auto shut off. The blue light is nice to look at."
Love my kettle! Its quick and easy to use. I have brought with me when I travel for tea and coffee. My kids use it to make their mac n cheese cups!
Greta little design and so pretty with the blue light! Water boils fast and this gadget is perfect for my office tea breaks. Efficient protective packing helped it arrive undamaged.

reviews.reviewTitle: Burnt plastic smell and smoke whenever turned on
reviews.reviewText: A year ago I bought the same electric kettle and it wasn’t great. However, this time after a couple of months of little use, there is smoke coming out from the base of the kettle and the water tastes and smells like burnt plastic. Potentially dangerous. Very disappointed.

I love this kettle, it is perfect for my tea drinking addiction. I love tea of all kinds, in the morning, afternoon and night. Having a fresh pot of boiling fresh water makes all the difference in the flavor. This boils the water much faster than using the stove and it even turns off when it is done so that the water never evaporates. So convenient.
This pot is perfect. It’s lovely on the counter and boils water quickly.
Love this kettle. Build water in a hurry then shuts itself off. Also very stylish looking, especially the blue light very nice touch

Loving my new kettle!! It’s so easy to open because of the pop up button for water at the top. I love the pretty blue led light inside it makes it so unique. What’s wonderful is the large quantity of water and capacity and it’s not too heavy when filled., The design is simple and classic/modern and it’s so nice and easy to use!
Purchased for my daughter for her birthday and she says it works really good and is pleased.

reviews.reviewTitle: Wow this deserves more than  5 stars
reviews.reviewText: I absolutely Love this water kettle!! Works better than a could imagine
So far so good. Have only had it a few days but am quite happy with the function and design. I bought it with Mueller’s stainless coffee press, they work well together
Great product. Heats up water faster than other electric kettles used prior.

Works fast, looks cool and reaches the perfect temperature very quickly., Almost as soon as i leave my kitchen i swear this thing is done boiling my water., Plus the light is a nice touch, Will update should my opinions change., But overall, im happy

reviews.reviewTitle: I love it! Practical and pretty.
reviews.reviewText: I LOVE IT! It is fast, the light is beautiful! I love everything about it!!
This is my second electric kettle we use it every day, it is great!
Within 4 minutes I had boiling water! It’s fast, easy to use, and pours clean.
Easy to use, love the auto shut off and the blue lights are a cool touch!

"TBH this is my first electric kettle, so I may be a little biased, but I love this thing! It heats up super fast and I like that you can see into it. It is super easy to use and doesnt take up a lot of space."
Great product! I love this kettle! Easy to use and works super quick. I would definitely buy again!
This is a great kettle! With a British spouse, this kettle gets a workout everyday! What a fantastic item.
Kettle is super easy to setup and use. Makes making tea so much easier.
Larger than I thought, but is convenient and quick.  Simple to use.
I was really impressed by the sternness of this kettle the clear glass is great and hold a lot of water, I don’t have to keep refilling. Shipping was fast it’s just an all around great product.

reviews.reviewTitle: High quality, easy to use, blue is nice, loud
reviews.reviewText: Only downside is that it is as loud as loud talking while heating.
awesome, would give it 5 stars if not for the fact that water leaks out the top when you pour it over too fast
"Gorgeous design, heats quickly, and does everything its supposed to well and with style.  Bought this for a friend and had to get one of my own."
Love this water heater.  Fast, safe, pretty..  boiling water in seconds
Very nice item. Opening on the smaller side, but big enough to clean and refill for sure.  Use weekly, no problems.

reviews.reviewText: update: I was finally able to reach their customer service and they were quick to reply and sent me a new kettle.  So far it is working well. It supposedly has a 2 year warranty but numerous attempts to reach their customer service have resulted in nothing. No reply, no response, nothing., I will have to replace it with another brand and hopefully can find something that lasts more than a few months.

"I received this as a wedding present in December 2018. After one month of use (I used it at least 5 or 6 times a week) it stopped turning on, so I would rotate it on the base until the blue light would come on, I thought maybe it just was sensitive. Today, August 24th, not even 9 months after getting this thing, it breaks. It no longer turns on, the blue light came on then shut off immediately. So I rotated it like Ive been doing the last 8 months, and it wouldnt work. So I washed it, left it overnight, came back to it this morning, and still wont turn on or boil water. This thing is crap. I would NOT recommend it to any of my friends or family, nor have I in the past 9 months because again, it started this after only one months worth of use.  Idk if maybe I got a lemon or what, but this is piece of crap. Wish I could return it or that I had returned it 8 months ago. I feel bad for my grandmother who bought me this."

Huge capacity, heats quickly and has an attractive blue light!  I use it everyday to heat my tea water.  I also use it when I need hot water when cooking items in water bath and for preparing hummingbird food.  Easy to use, looks nice just sitting on the countertop.

reviews.reviewTitle: Second one stopped working - poor quality electrical contacts
reviews.reviewText: This is the second one I bought. Both eventually stopped working as the contact with the base stopped working. When I opened it the electricals look very cheaply put together. Definitely not typical German work as indicated.

reviews.reviewTitle: Burning plastic smell and taste - Will Return
reviews.reviewText: My husband purchased this kettle as a gift for me. I loved the shape, the blue lights, the quick boiling, and the spout that fit under my refrigerator’s filtered water outlet. I have used it everyday -at least once a day. After only a few weeks of normal use (and only filtered water), I came into the kitchen to the strong, noxious smell of burning plastic. The water heated to the desired temperature, but tasted of burnt plastic. Hopefully we can return it quickly to Amazon. We will not be buying it again.

"I purchased Mueller kettle based on very good reviews. The kettle worked flawlessly for 3 months. Unfortunately, as soon as the return warranty expired the electrical connection between the kettle and the base failed. It got loose, started sparking delivering characteristic smell of burned electrical insulation. As this cant be repaired the only solution is to dispose. I was highly disappointed as the performance didnt meet expectations. Despite reasonable price the product was not worth expense."
This product broke after several months. Purchased in March Broke in August. Different seller. Google reviews said the same thing. I should have trusted them.

reviews.reviewTitle: Replacing after 10 months due to burning plastic.
reviews.reviewText: I bought this kettle for the first time in October 2018 and after a month the connection between the base and kettle failed, but after leaving a poor review the company contacted me and offered a free replacement along with refunding my original purchase. I was thrilled and gladly accepted as this is a daily use item for my husband and I and it seemed to be a fluke. 10 months of heavy use later we are getting a burning plastic/electric smell, so we have to replace it again. Being fairly new to electric kettles I don’t know if buying a new one on a yearly basis is normal or not, but for $30, I guess it’s not the end of the world.

I loved this kettle when I bought it until after 2 months of use the lid became difficult to open and eventually fell off completely. It is made of cheap plastic. I contacted the company who were very good and replaced the kettle. I have used the new kettle since August 10th, the day my kitchen reno finished and today 20th September the lid has completely come off again. It is now out of warranty by a couple of months so I guess I have to buy a new one. I do not ever want another one of this same kettle anyway. It has to be the worst product I have ever bought. I would not recommend anyone buy this.

"I bought my Mueller kettle last year near Thanksgiving!  Great product and convenience.  However, 3 months ago we started experiencing problems with getting the kettle to work.  Right now, it does not work.  I am disappointed in Mueller kettle.  If I have to pay for a new one every 10 months, then its a very bad product!"
"Switch didnt work properly from first month of use."

This worked well while it worked but only lasted a couple of years. What broke was the lid to open and close the appliance. I am writing this while looking for a different brand to replace it. It was fairly inexpensive, so maybe I got what I paid for.

"This thing is a daily frustration.  Youre supposed to open the lid by pressing a button, but it rarely works.  We have to repeatedly smash the button before it finally opens. Also: it makes poor contact with the base, so we have to carefully rotate it until the light comes on.", The reviews for this product are obviously fake.

I bought this kettle in January and I have really liked it. The kettle is easy to clean and maintain but it is now September and I am having an issue. When I try to use the kettle I need to spin the water heater around on the hearing element to get a  connection. I think it is just a poor connection. Does anyone have a suggestion about how to correct the issue?

reviews.reviewTitle: Not reliable burns after a year.
reviews.reviewText: We bought the previous model and have used it (average once a day) and after a year it started acting weird and stopping before the boiling and smelling like burnt plastic. Really disappointing because the rest was great.
The lid cannot be opened properly. The kettle is totally out of function after 6 months. The kettle is supposed to have 2 year warranty but still negotiating with the manufacturer.
The design looks good but the cover won’t open, Update, Emailed customer service. I was very pleased with the help!

Super happy with this purchase, my cheap walmart electric kettle finally bit the dust and when I found this on Amazon, I thought I\d give it a go. I"m happy I did, after reading it\s quality assurance reviews, now I have to write my own. It boils water super fast and it\s quality material makes me feel comfortable that the kettle will be work for (hopefully) years to come.
Loved this kettle until it stopped working less than a year after I got it., Update, company contacted me after this review and was so helpful. They sent me a replacement kettle free of charge.
"Its good looking, but uncomfortable to hold when full due to a poorly designed handle. No matter, it broke quickly, so we chucked it and bought a different unit."

"There is a reason why this kettle won a 2019 design award. Its beautiful to look at and the blue lights are mesmerizing. However, this kettle started malfunctioning about six months after purchase.  The stand is flimsy and made out of cheap plastic. The kettle would shut off before the water boiled. If you jiggled the kettle on its flimsy stand, you could get it to turn on again and come to a boil. After two years it stopped working altogether and no matter how much I jiggled it, I couldnt get it to turn on.  Cool design is great, but how about creating something that works and lasts?"
This product worked great for 6 months. After the 6 month mark it stopped turning on.

reviews.reviewTitle: worked for a few months then became hard to use
reviews.reviewText: "The simplicity (and the blue light) were appealing, and the price is certainly good, so I bought this a few months ago.  It worked well for a couple of months, but then it became more and more difficult to get it to make the connection between the pot and the base in such a way that the pot was activated.  Now its just frustration to use (it takes over a dozen attempts to get it to start each time I try to use it), so Ill probably replace it. (and yes, I have cleaned the canister and no, the base has not come in contact with water)"

"I loved the glass pot the led lights are great ,but the heater is made of cheap plastic , my inclination it would not last long was true ,it no longer heats  , at first I started having to move pot off and on several times to get a connection and now it wont connect at all , no longer works , its sitting under the counter useless~ back to my stove top kettle"
"I bought this in March 2018, and in October 2019, it wasnt possible to open the top any more (pressing on button).", On November 14, the heating element stopped working., "I dont recommend this."

"Started to use this on 9/23 and by 10/15 it was smoking and smelling like burning plastic when I tried to use it. DO NOT BUY! Worked great up until then, but I would hope its meant to last for more than 3 weeks."

reviews.reviewTitle: Great product and great customer service!
reviews.reviewText: "I loved my kettle. However after daily use for a year and a half, the kettle stopped working. I saw that there was a 2 yr manufacurers warranty and contacted Mueller. They said that a few of these units have a manufacturs defect and assured me that units bought on Amazon are covered under the warranty. They offered to replace my unit and a couple of days later, it arrived. I was impressed by how fast they responded and acted. Great customer service! Would keep buying their products."

"We make tea and coffee daily, so having a reliable kettle is key. This one was great (and designed well!) for a few months before it gave up entirely. The price is right, but ultimately it didnt last at all."

What a complete joke, you will burn your hand first time you use it.  Once you figure out how to hold it, it works fine, until it doesn’t.  Won’t turn on, it’s a $30 kettle and it acts like one.  Pretty disappointing, lasted approx. 9 months of everyday use.
We love our new water heater! Perfect for our French press coffee, hot cocoa, tea, and hot toddies! Water heats up within minutes.  Good quality kettle.

The product itself is great, works well, and easy to use., After about a year of use I had an issue with the lid not popping open when I would push the button.  I contacted Mueller customer service and they were great - I got a quick response and an immediate resolution without any hassle.  Highly recommended.

I love using this kettle to make up hot water bottles! The lights are so fun! And I really like that the lid is plastic. My old one was metal and I would sometimes burn my finger when I closed it if I was heating a second pot. Only negative is that the lid doesn’t open quite as wide as I would like sometimes. Other than that my favorite kettle so far!
This products works well and like that it’s clear! It’s a must buy if you are a tea drinker

very easy to use was very happy with it,but the lid just broke for no apparent reason.Called the seller and they are replacing my Kettle no questions ask even though I still explained the woman was very nice and said no problem we will replace it,great costumer  service.

This is a great tea kettle! It heats up quickly and that was exactly what I was looking for. It’s pretty cool with the LED lights and it is a good size. It completely separates from the base which is a nice feature... no unplugging cords or anything like that… Very good kettle at a great price!!!

reviews.reviewTitle: An efficient product to invest in.
reviews.reviewText: The water heats up quickly and is extremely enthralling to watch because of the neon lights. Definitely would recommend.
This is a really nice kettle. It looks very modern and heats the water quickly. It has a nice blue light that makes the water look awesome when boiling. It is easy to clean too.

reviews.reviewTitle: MUELLER PREMIUM 2019 MODEL 1500W ELECTRIC WATER HEATER
reviews.reviewText: I BOUGHT IN JANUARY AND REALLY LIKED IT AT FIRST HOWEVER IT HAS QUIT WORKING I TURN IT ON AND IT JUST FLIPS THE BUTTON BACK OFF IT SHOULD LAST LONGER THAN THAT WILL NOT BUY ANOTHER ONE OF THESE

reviews.reviewTitle: looks lovely and heats up fast
reviews.reviewText: Loving this kettle. looks beautiful when the water is boiling :). my green tea actually tastes better when i use the temperature setting for green tea...did not know that temperature makes so much of a difference in taste.
"Heats evenly and pretty quickly. Really like the handle and that its heat resistant. This is my first kettle and I its super!"
Huge fan of this product.  We use it daily. Great gift.  Shoutout to Mueller USA customer service - Eve at the 888.632.9981 in particular - who helped assist me when I had a problem.

Had the 2018 model which started heating up on the handle area. The company was fantastic in addressing the issue and sending a new model out to replace the older model. Great product and customer service.
I start every day with this kettle and it never lets me down. I like that I can see into the kettle and the blue light is a hit with my kids! Comes to a rapid boil in just a few minutes.

reviews.reviewTitle: I am very Happy with it!
reviews.reviewText: It works just like it was listed.  Good quality and it looks good.  It is everything I had hoped it would be.
A very stylish water kettle which is very well made and has a good capacity. I look forward to years of use.
Had no problems with the kettle but after 15 months it has broken. The switch has stopped working and kettle is no longer usable. Pretty disappointing after such a short period of time.
Great kettle. Heats fast.  Cool design. Best kettle I ever owned.
"The product was great but after a few months it doesnt turn on- maybe something with cord? I would expect a longer period of time for it not to malfunction."
Heats up quickly and safely. Auto-off feature is nice. Opening to add in water is a little small though. Not really an issue for me, but I did notice that.
It is amazing. Love the design and the vibrant blue led light when water is warming up. Great product I’m glad I bought it

reviews.reviewTitle: Exactly what I needed in a kettle
reviews.reviewText: It heats up very quickly. Just what I needed!
Such a pretty product to be used over & over! I love the speed at which it boils water & the color!
I love the design and it is easy to use.  It heats up very quickly and shipped quickly as well.
The kettle is large, the lights are or cool, and it works great so far!

reviews.reviewTitle: Easy to use and gets the job done.
reviews.reviewText: Easy to use, boils water quickly, and looks nice in the kitchen!
Has a great water capacity and the light helps in the morning!
Water boils really quickly. Like the sleek design of the unit. Easy to clean. Easy to use.
I really like the kettle. The blue led color is cool and it quickly boils water
It broke within a year!!! DO NOT BUY.
Heats quickly. Holds a lot of water. Automatic shut off.
Sleek and handsome design
Makes the water spell and taste like plastic
Amazing
Fast and easy to use
Good product and design

"I actually like that all you have to do is flip a switch not having to deal with all the extra settings to figure out.  The top is wide enough that its easy to fill without making a mess and it doesnt leak when poured.  While heating up its a really pretty blue once the water is at temp light turns off.  It stays warm for over an hour (I normally leave for work at that point so I cant verify length after that).  So far Ive used for tea and oatmeal like how it holds temp."

"I bought this kettle to use at school so I could have tea or hot cocoa.  This kettle heats water so fast! Its amazing. I put two cups of cold water in my kettle on my stove turned to high, then I put two cups of cold water in this kettle. I actually waited for my stove to come to heat before hitting the start button on the electric kettle. The electric kettle boiled first! Amazing!", The kettle lights up when "on". It has automatic shutoff when the water boils. I would buy it again in a heart beat.

"This electric kettle heats up the water really fast and its easy to use. I especially like that it automatically shuts off once the water is hot. Which is perfect for those days that im running late and forget to turn off appliances! The fact that its cordless is such an added bonus for when guests come and I can take the kettle straight to them. The colored light gives it a unique touch. The price is amazing for the quality."

Boils water quickly.  The auto shut off is convenient.  It holds more water than I thought it would.  Overall, I am very happy with this electric tea kettle.  Great for heating water for tea and instant soups.

My husband loves to drink tea as does his whole family. It seems like it takes a while to boil a pot of water on the stove so I figured I’d order this. It works great! It heats up the water super quick and illuminates blue as well. So much easier! Easy to clean as well and doesn’t take up much counter space.

reviews.reviewTitle: Very easy to use, boils very quickly, lovely design
reviews.reviewText: "The kettle is made really well. Nice hard plastic and glass. It is simple to use with one button. I do wish there was a temperature setting. It boils in about 4 or 5 minutes. It automatically shuts off when it reaches a certain temp and when you turn it back on, it has a safety measure to prevent overheating. Holds a nice amount of water. I love that it lights up blue and you can see the water boil through the glass sides, its actually really pretty in a funny way."

"This beautiful little thing boils water faster than the stove. Its glorious to look at and you can boil water in any room of the house.", Which means tea on the second floor of your house!!! What a win!! I love the blue light and how visually appealing it is! This is a great product!

I was tired of my hissing tea kettle and having to go and turn off the burner quickly before the water dried up. This kettle I simply just  love it. It’s a perfect size and doesn’t take any room up on your counter. A bright blue light turns on when you turn it on to use indicating it’s ready to boil and It shuts off automatically, so I don’t have to rush over to turn it off. I also noticed water stayed pretty hot for awhile.

reviews.reviewTitle: LOVE this! Heats up very quickly
reviews.reviewText: "I have been wanting one of these for a while and finally decided to get it. Im so grateful I did! The water heats up very quickly and the pot lights up this beautiful blue color. I love that the button to open the lid is on the top, so I dont accidentally hit it while Im pouring. I cannot believe I went this long without one!"

reviews.reviewTitle: Heats up the water so fast
reviews.reviewText: This electric kettle is great! I love to have some hot chocolate at night before I go to bed and this kettle heats up the water so quickly. It is easy to clean because the top is wide enough to fit your hand in and it is also quiet. Great little kettle for sure!

reviews.reviewTitle: Easy to use and clean, heats up quickly
reviews.reviewText: "Works so well! It heats up really quickly which is fantastic for making oatmeal, tea, apple cider, or just having hot water. Im very pleased with it and Im enjoying using it for lots of things. The light up feature is nice and the cable length is perfect."

We have one of these at our office that we use for coffee/tea, and also for other things around since our hot water rarely works in a timely manner. Had the same one for year and it’s stood up to everything we use it for. Always thought it was so handy, ordered this one for my house. Heats the water so quick and I use it for tea and the baby’s morning oatmeal. Super easy and fast to use.

reviews.reviewTitle: I will never go back to a stove top kettle ever
reviews.reviewText: This thing is totally easy to use I love it it heats up water like 90 seconds and works great to make cheese and hot beverages I love that it makes a bigger amount then my coffee machine so I can make hot coffee or hot chocolate for my kids I love it.

I have use the same old kettle for the last 15 years. I dropped it and the handle broke so I was forced to buy a new one. I am so happy I invested in this one. It hold more than enough water and I could not believe how fast the water got hot, right before my eyes. The kettle is made of strong material and built to last the next 15 years or longer. It fits nicely on the counter and does not take up a lot of room. It lights up to let you know it is on and boiling and has an automatic shut off if ever it runs out of water while in the on position. Such a genius creation and fits great with modern day technology. The base does not get hot but the kettle can be too warm for little fingers and hands. I am so pleased with my new kettle!

reviews.reviewTitle: Great Kettle - Now My Tea Tastes Like Tea!
reviews.reviewText: "I purchased this new kettle because Ive been sharing our coffee maker with my husband and Im a tea drinker - thus my tea sometimes has the taste of coffee - ugh.  Now my tea tastes great!", "Ive been impressed with the quality of the kettle, quickly boils the water, fairly compact (can definitely travel with the kettle giving you water you know is safe to drink) - doesnt take up a whole lot of space and I love that it turns itself off when the water is gone.  When its heating the water turns blue because of a built-in LED light, letting you know it is heating - very entertaining.  Super easy to clean.", "100% BPA free, has nice grip handle - wont slip out of your hand (some of us can be a little clumsy!  Has a nice pour top. 2 year warranty with Mueller."

reviews.reviewTitle: Three prong US plug, not mentioned
reviews.reviewText: "Nowhere does it say in the description that this unit uses a three prong plug.  Transitioning from an older pot thats two prong is a bit of a shock.  My kitchen counter plugs are still two prong, this was an immediate issue.  I had to buy and cheap adapter in order to make it work.  Also, the connecting wire is so stiff that the base will not sit properly on my counter.  Also, the wire stiffness forces the plug with adapter downwards, with possibility of unplugging.  It has not happened yet but I can see it happening soon.  Un-boxing the product was a head-scratcher.  There was this sand-like residue inside the plastic holding the product.  It was not much but there was enough causing some rubbing on the black finish of the pot making it look like its been sand-papered.  Was this a return item from some sandy beach customer?  Anyway, I wiped it clean and rinsed the pot to ensure, I dont get sand in my tea.  The rubbing is not so visible but I know its there.  As for the pot, its heavy.  Yes, its made of glass so compared to my original plastic pot, I expected the heft but not so much thats truly noticeable.  I guess part of it is, the handle is so fat that with smaller hands, plus the heft, its certainly gives the appearance of heaviness too.  It has a cool blue light indicating that its operating properly.  Yes, it boils water fast with auto shut off.  The top opening cover can be pulled back a tad bit to allow for easy filling.  Pouring using the spout is precise without splashing.  I suppose you can open the cover for a quick pour when filling a stewing or pasta pot.  Returning the pot on the base is also not precise.  I find myself hunting for the centering connector in order to sit the pot properly.  Part of the problem I believe is the base is so light and flimsy compared to the pot, the whole setup feels unstable.  Its like giving a Humvee bicycle tires instead of fat, sure-footed stout tires.  The current footing for the base is plastic instead of rubber.  I not sure if I like this product yet."
