required to watch this video., Install Flash Player, \xa0Product arrived on time as agreed and in excellent brand new condition with no breaks or blemishes as expected., The auto-shut off feature will flip the manual switch to "off" on the handle like magic while the blue light disengages at boiling temp ie. 212 deg F = 100 deg C (see video)., The made by Strix of Isle of Mann, UK power base has a simple aluminum protective strip going around a type of not so endearing black plastic mould., The power chord slips through a formed gate on the under circumference of the power base., I suggest plugging the power chord into a simple 110v outlet through a surge cube or a surge strip to protect the device from any incoming power spikes., Time to boil for a 1-Liter (33 ounces) fill line = 3 minutes to 5 minutes before auto shut off occurs., Suggested max capacity is 60 ounces (1.8 Liters)., Perfect for a large pot pour over of teas to steep., And, if you have a 1-Liter size French press beaker, ditto., The plug and chord are sound, the power base must be the cheapest item in the kit!, "Still at that, you cant budge my 5-Star rating!", I suppose the power base may be either proprietary or generic in its design., Either way, if anything blows over the two-year life of the warranty the Mueller Co. of Austria, EU will stand by their Chinese made-to-quality-spec device., And, if you register your new electric kettle via email, the warranty instantly becomes doubled per the provided insert., Update. This unit and its base are very well insulated from the heat of a full boil. It is very easy to simply grab and pour the contents of the kettle after the blue light indicating power becomes automatically disengaged. Neither is the base warm to the touch. I would grant a 5+ to the number of stars, if allowed, for this product.

"This kettle is perfect for boiling water in a super short amount of time. We replaced our Keurig and now will only use this kettle and our french press. Weve used it at least once every day for a almost a month now and we constantly ask why we didnt switch sooner. The blue light inside the pot is great because you always know when its been turned on and is boiling without having to get close to double check. Definitely recommend this product over other kettles that often steam so much your cabinets sweat."

"I honestly was not familiar with this brand until I got their electric pressure cooker.....so now its 2 for 2!  I love a good pour over cup of coffee in the morning and was using kettle on gas stove that if I didnt get to it soon enough the whistle would wake up anyone sleeping in the house still.  I also didnt have much precision pouring around the edges with it and had considered getting one of the kettles with the extended hook spout thingy.  Im glad I didnt because I just love everything about this electric kettle and I have great control with pouring the hot water around the coffee grounds.  I love that if I have it filled the night before - all I need to do is hit the switch, it boils and shuts off and by the time I have ground my beans and put them in the filter I am ready to do my pour over.  I have used for other things that I need hot water...but honestly if I just used it for my pour over and tea - Im completely satisfied!  Great product!"

I for some reason find the blue hue very relaxing !,  This kettle heats up amazingly fast! I use this at work (Special Ed Teacher),  For my coffee or hot chocolate. On days I am running a bit behind and I have not found the time to be able to have breakfast. I just plug in my kettle on the slip resistant disk it heats up so incredibly fast that I have time to fix myself a quick bowl of oatmeal before my students come up to my class.  For some reason I just think hot water and oatmeal taste so much better than microwavable oatmeal  In my humble opinion ✨,  This Kettle is a quick time  saver for sure.  Honestly you just do not realize all the uses for hot water throughout your day or your week and tell you have it available right at your fingertips!!,  Do yourself a favor, spoil yourself with this phenomenal little gem!!!!

Regarding plastic taste.  When I got it, I put water, lemon and apple cider vinegar and boiled it first.  Rinsed then use with regular water.  No plastic taste like others have stated., The machine stopped working correctly after two months.  Before it’s done boiling water, it stops working and light turns off, but the button stays in on position.  Then it turns on randomly on its own 10 minutes later.  So it doesn’t boil water anymore.  Just heats a bit, goes in sleep mode, then randomly starts again., Too bad it sucks.  It was good when it worked.  And I liked the clear glass and blue light.  But two months is not a good life.  My old one I got in 2017 and still working have to my mom when I got this one.

My husband decided to quit drinking coffee and use the coffee maker to heat water for tea.  So in order to keep my morning coffee, I had to find a solution.  This kettle is amazing!  It heats the water fast and he loves the cool blue light.  He gets his tea and I get my coffee.  Win, win!

reviews.reviewTitle: Quick set up and easy to use
reviews.reviewText: I absolutely love this little kettle. I bought it to use at work, I fill it up when I get in to work in the morning. I can make  Hot tea, hot chocolate, and oatmeal. It saves me money by being able to make these in the morning at work instead of stopping at the coffee shop on the way to work. Now my co-workers use it too. It is easy to clean up, and the safety department at my work approved me to use it in my workspace.

This is my second electric kettle and this one is so much nicer then my other one! The lid stays shut perfectly and heats up so fast! I love how it automatically turns off when done and the night goes off indicating it’s done! Really a great help in the kitchen!

reviews.reviewTitle: Most Classic Design in an Easy to Use, Fast Boiling Cordless Electric Kettle Water Heater!
reviews.reviewText: I cannot say enough about this electric hot water kettle! I am an avid hot tea enthusiast and boil water often throughout the day. It takes no time for this electric pot to get hot. I have a steaming mug of hot tea in minutes! When the unit is on, it is illuminated beautifully by a blue light that glows with life and sparkle, adding ambience to the simple art of heating water. Easy to clean, easy to fill... the top lid pops up by the press of a center button, and snaps down to close. The glass carafe settles onto the electrically driven stand and shuts off as soon as high temperature is achieved and the water is boiling. Great to heat up water instantly, for cooking too. I had a perfectly good hot water pot before but the Mueller Premium 2019 Model 1500W Electric Kettle Water Heater with Speedboil Technology, 1.8 Liter Cordless with LED tops all others with class, ease and stylish, modern design! Pouring from the kettle is cordless, and the handle is still cool to the touch.

reviews.reviewTitle: First model received was DOA--second one was not
reviews.reviewText: The first model I received did not work.  The great thing about Amazon was return was hassle-free and replacement arrived next day.  Replacement worked perfectly and does its thing looking pretty cool while doing it.  Heats water fast.  My only "complaint" is that the base is made of light plastic that can be hard to keep flat if kettle is not on it.  They should add a little more heft to it.  However, kettle lifts of it after water heated without any issues.

"This product is pretty standard with light. It takes 5mins to boil 1.8l water (quite normal). The only Im not quite happy is the lid cant open wide. Actually it can open very limited, which make filling water kind of inconvenient."

reviews.reviewTitle: Tea drinkers, this is the one!
reviews.reviewText: Somewhere in the dark recesses of my basement sits the first effort I made to acquire an electric kettle that would deliver the blazing hot water necessary to brew real flavor in a pot of premium loose black tea.  The new kettle boiled up furiously, and then the water passed through a long spout as I poured it and was thusly cooled to a pleasant bathwater warmth., Years have passed since that experience, and I ordered this kettle over my longtime misgivings.  When I prepared my first potful, I was skeptical, knowing that the pot would shut off automatically when it reached a boil.  What sort of a boil, I wondered.  A few bubbles? I was thrilled to find it came to a raging, rolling boil and then shut off.  And that blazing hot water poured cleanly from the stubby little spout directly onto my loose tea.  A complete success., "If youre going to buy expensive premium loose tea, you need to brew it with the help of a premium tea kettle.  This is it."
This is really fun it heats up super duper fast and the light is very bright and pretty. The lights makes hot water more fun. We use it in our RV and at home great for hot chocolate and tea!
I love this kettle. I drink tea all the time and this makes it so easy to make. My daughter broke my last one, so I am glad I found this one. I may get another one for my office.

Overall great so far! Just received product. I had a little trouble getting to figure out how the filter behind the spout removes, but it does. Left side of the spout, pull back on edge, push in from spout side, and it pops out from the little safety catch. It is plastic so I won’t do it often, but I do want to clean it occasionally so that was good., If you are looking for a pot that heats to a particular temperature, this isn’t it. It boils, then shuts off. I like the LED light feature. I would boil several pots of water before using it for consumption just as I would for any other product., If your hand is large it won’t fit inside to clean, but my medium hands do barely fit inside to clean.

reviews.reviewTitle: Would buy again or use as a gift
reviews.reviewText: This is such a nice electric kettle! I like that I can heat up water when the stove top is already occupied. It’s a nice size and easy to clean.

This thing works great! I have a traditional stove top kettle, but it takes forever to heat up and I needed something quicker for the mornings. This gets water to a rolling boil in less than 2 minutes! I love how fast it is and it looks nice sitting on the counter (matches my stainless appliances). The heating element is inside of the kettle, so I don’t have to worry about the kids touching it accidentally. The auto shut-off feature is great too!

"Recently stayed with a friend who had a similar product so thought Id give it a try. The one she had was plastic so after a few uses it started to get a weird cloudy coloring to it since this one is mostly glass, it shouldnt do the same thing. The plastic feels durable and the entire container feels pretty sturdy. The only issue is cleaning it. The lid doesnt pop off all the way, unless I just havent figured it out yet, so it makes cleaning a bit difficult but was able to just swoosh some soapy water around which should be sufficient if you are just boiling water in the container. I also like that the spout has a little strainer over it."

reviews.reviewTitle: Made from quality materials and is the best kettle I’ve owned so far!
reviews.reviewText: This is my favorite kettle so far.  I own two already before purchasing this one and this is definitely my favorite.  It heats the water quickly and looks really nice.  My favorite thing about this is that it lights up the water as it is heating it, but once it’s done the light goes off and that is easy for me to see from my great room.  I know when the water is ready.  I highly recommend this kettle.

Great kettle. My old one finally gave out, saw this one which was quite and upgrade from my last one which was basic. This one is beautiful. Heard water for my tea or my coffee for a single cup! Love the glass, easy to clean and store away

"We purchased this for our daughters first year in college. It is a nice unit, heats up the water quickly and is easy to clean. I like the blue light on while it is heating as well as the auto shut off feature.  The cord is a bit short in a dorm room situation, I understand the safety issue with this for a home, however, it forces you to use it on the floor in a dorm with limited outlets. If there was a larger size I would get one for home.", I do not understand the  "Flavor" option in the rating section for this review, so I left it blank.

The gas went out my apartment building, and I needed to heat my tea in the morning. Had good reviews and lives up to them. Very easy to use, and it looks good. Cleaning isn’t super easy, but it’s not difficult. I wish the lid came off entirely. However, I really wish I had gotten one with the temperature setting. This just boils, and it does a great job in a few minutes, but I like my tea under 170 degrees so I usually stand there and watch. Side note, I’m a sucker for blue lights!

This boils fast, like in 2 minutes. I love that is is glass. The only reason I took off a star was because the cord is super short and I had to put it on the floor. I got this for my office,  so I do not have higher outlets. It should be fine on a kitchen counter., I had another one, that was easier to clean because the lid came off. This lid is fixed and only opens about an 1 and a half inches. But again, the boil time is rapid. My old one took about 10 minutes and was stainless steel.

The opening isn’t any larger than other brands, so it’s not easier to clean getting your hand inside. It design is good. It is fast. The quality of the steel bottom is either defective or less than the last kettle I had. It already has a black pit mark. My last kettle lasted four years and only the heating component went bad. Disappointed but can live with it., Follow up. I wanted to return this with the pit or rust in the bottom, but seems you shortened the return window.

"This is a fantastic kettle. I use it every morning and works perfect. It heats up the water in record time, saves energy and shuts itself off when the water starts to boil. The blue light when in use is an amazing added plus. I also like that I can see the amount of water that is in the kettle at all times and will know when its time to clean it. I am very impressed with the quality and the performance of this well made product. Great for the office, house…I loved it so much!"

I don’t know it the kettle I received was a return as it had spots on the bottom of the carafe. I did the initial boil to clean it before use and the spots remained. My hand is able to reach in and used Barkeepers Friend Soft Cream  to scrub the spots. I have to tell you that the cleaning cloth was totally black afterwards., The stand doesn’t sit flat and the I have to rinse the  carafe out each time or the condensation will sit inside forever., I’m going to shop for a better quality kettle though I liked everything else.

"Its so much i can say about this kettle! its very well made has a sturdy weight to it and im totally satisfied with the quality. It dont take long at all for the water to get hot and i really like the blue appearance it gives off. Very good for the cost and was well worth the purchase"

I like the look and reliability of this water kettle. We have been using it all the time. Water cooks fast, and see-through is fun. I only wish, they had added another latch so that one could open and close it with one hand (the one, holding the kettle) - instead of to have to touch the lid area with the other hand (two hand action). I have been using other "Mueller" products, a coffee grinder, and so far I am really very happy with the quality.

reviews.reviewTitle: Their customer service the best I have ever dealt with.
reviews.reviewText: This is my second Mueller electric kettle. My first one worked just fine for almost 2 years but then the lid came off of its hinges and I am unable to fix it. I called the company asking for a new lid only, but instead, they are sending a replacement kettle.  They could not have been more professional. I would buy from this company again even if my new one breaks. The product is an incredible value for the money.  EJA

reviews.reviewTitle: Hot water for my tea everyday
reviews.reviewText: Hot water for my tea.  It is easier to make the tea with this.  I no longer have coffee taste with my tea from using a coffee pot.  This heats us really fast and is easy to use.  Just fill it up and turn it on.  I can also take this to work as it is small and fits into my bag.

This electric kettle is wonderful. It looks modern and matches my other kitchen appliances and accessories. I love that it is clear! I had an older electric kettle but you could not see into it, so I always wondered how clean it was. No guessing with this new one! Also, the blue light is really pretty. It’s fun to watch the water boil and bubble in the pretty blue light. It works really fast and is super easy to use. Overall very happy with this purchase!

reviews.reviewTitle: Great quality for a great price.
reviews.reviewText: "I purchased this water kettle to replace a series of bad purchases that failed in one way or another. One even required an electrician after it blew and outlet. With the Mueller, Ive had no thoughts of it not working. The materials and construction are excellent. It feels like a sturdy product when held and when on the base. The plug is grounded so no problems there. The opening is on the smaller side to clean but the brush I use works fine. Water is heated quickly. Great product and a great price point. Ive paid more for far inferior products."

It does the job quick and easy. The temperature is just right for tea or coffee. It turns off when the water reaches the boiling point. I would prefer to have a cap that is able to clip on and off so it is easier to clean the jar. Overall, satisfied with the purchase.

IT PURIFIES THE WATER. And the best think is that it saves electricity and it’s fast to boil. The Voltage is 110-120. It’s easy to clean.it has cool light feature. It has automatic shutoff and it’s safe. It does heat the water super fast and it does makes it taste way better. It has double warranty. I love the fact that I can see how much water in in the kettle. I am impressed by the quality and the price! Amazing!!

This is the third electric kettle that we have owned and this will definitely be the last. The water heats up super quick, faster than other kettles I’ve owned. Also, it has a blue LED light that looks super cool when the water is heating up. It just feels solid like a very well-made product. We use it almost every day at the house! It is also perfect when we go camping in our motorhome. I may even buy a 2nd one just to keep in the RV!

My previous water kettle stopped working and I am so glad to have found a very similar version for a fraction of the price I had paid. The size is perfect for a small family and I have boiling water within minutes. This is an absolute time saver for the mornings when I am rushing to make tea, coffee, or oatmeal on the go. This is the home gadget that gets the most use in my family. It is exactly what I needed.

This electric kettle is awesome!  Very well made, durable, easy to clean, easy to store.  Heats water up very fast (less than 5 mins) and the blue light adds a nice Touch.  I’m the only tea drinker in my household, so this is just perfect. Hot tea anytime I desire.

Bought this to replace a ceramic kettle when the heating disc on the bottom began to chip and leave debris in the water. I love the clear design so you can see how much water is in it and when it needs a good clean. The top opening isn’t big enough for my hand, but it hasn’t been an issue to clean. It heats up very quickly and the wireless design allows me to bring it to the table or around safely.

reviews.reviewTitle: Fast heating, easy to use, super sleek
reviews.reviewText: Love this product. I love drinking tea and had been microwaving my hot water but was having an issue with the mug getting too hot without the water getting hot. I did some research on electric kettles and went with this one. It heats up the water super fast, looks sleek in my kitchen and is so easy to use. Only wish I had bought this sooner! Also when the kettle is turned on it has a colored light which is great!

The best thing about this kettle for me is that it’s transparent (my previous one wasn’t so I never knew if I had to put water in or how filthy it was with residue over time). I liked the design - fits well with the rest of my kitchen. It’s energy efficient and holds water hot for a long time. Looks cool with all the blue lights. I also trust the brand - Mueller makes quality products.

"Im really impressed with the quality of this kettle. Everything about it is fantastic. It boils water in 5 minutes or less and I love the automatic shut-off feature once the water boils. Another nice feature is the lights at the bottom when its heating (which turn off once the water has come to a boil). Its not only pretty, it lets me know when the water is done boiling. Get this kettle; you wont be disappointed!"

reviews.reviewTitle: Modern technolgy brings tea to life
reviews.reviewText: I am all about convenience, so instead of worrying about when my tea will be ready, it takes me 2 minutes to set up, leave to do other things, come back and tea ready to go. No need to worry, it has automatic shut off. The cord is on the base and the kettle sets on the base, so easy to put into the fridge. Another thing I like about this kettle is the screen where you pour, so I can use my favorite loose teas.

I love being able to heat a whole kettle of water. I used to microwave individual cups of hot water for hot cocoa, or soup cups. This is fast, quiet and I love the blue. It’s compact and fits nicely on my counter. My girls love watching it.

"Elaboration on cleaning easily: the opening isnt large enough for my knuckles. I purchased a long-stemmed, soft-bristle brush designed specifically for getting into hard-to-reach spaces like this.  This kettle boils much more quietly than did the previous (different brand) electric kettle water heater we owned.  This Mueller has a nice ergonomic feel.  And the price is right!"

"Not big on gushing reviews, but although Ive only had it a week, this thing is super-convenient. Fill it up the night before, come into the kitchen in the morning and press the button. 5 minutes and I have boiling water for tea. No more messing with the steel kettle on the gas stove and its annoying whistle and tendency to overheat and burn you. If this thing lasts, it will be worth far more than the $30 or so I paid for it. Highly recommended."
Bought this a month ago. At first, worked great, boiled water nicely, Now, barely heats water! Useless!
Cute kettle. Great for tea, oatmeal hot chocolate. Anything you need hot water for this is a great asset.

"Ive had a couple electric kettles and this,by far, is the best.  Its fun to actually see the water boiling and the blue light adds a little warmth to the area.  Its quick and easy and very well made,  very happy with this purchase."

reviews.reviewTitle: Where’s the bottom of this kettle?
reviews.reviewText: Where’s the bottom part of this kettle? It won’t heat itself.

reviews.reviewTitle: Amazing kettle for a very good price!!
reviews.reviewText: Ordered a couple weeks ago and I am loving this kettle. I had several ones in the pass, but I am very impressed with how fast it get the water hot and how it is easy to clean., Had lots of complements on who nice it looks too., For the the price you are getting a excellent product. I had researched and owned many others. This is very nice believe me.

reviews.reviewTitle: This Kettle is ultra FAST and I love the beautiful blue color!
reviews.reviewText: "I prefer to make my ice tea with teabags but I always forget about the boiling water on the stove top!  I now can have my boiling water in just a couple of minutes so I dont need to walk away from the task - I was able to make a gallon of tea in a very short time!!  I love the blue color, its so pretty and the auto shut off feature assures me its safe."

The on button for my current kettle is loose so I was very excited to upgrade my stainless steel kettle to this glass kettle water boiler. I think it looks better than my stainless steel one overall and the LED light up is a nice touch. Also glad that I can now see exactly how clean or dirty my kettle is inside. Everything is functioning on this kettle, happy with my purchase.

I use this to boil water for tea, instant coffee, oatmeal - pretty much the things you boil water for., "Much better that the proctor silex it replaced.  The Mueller sits on a base that powers it - once water boils you can just lift carafe off and pour the boiling water- no cord. Boils rapidly, has screen over spout, and lights up a when boiling with blue leds, which is nice when waking in predawn hours. The clear bowl is nice to make sure its clean, and gives a good view of boiling water."

This kettle blends function with a stylish sleek design that is perfect for entertaining. I’ve used it with guests for afternoon tea and even to boil water quickly instead of waiting for it to boil on the stove top. The kettle has so many uses and comes at a very reasonable price point, a perfect addition to the kitchen in the upcoming winter months.

"A very nice glass kettle. The lights are dazzling. Only kind of joking about that! Nice and quick auto shut off at boil. I didnt look at the capacity very well and this kettle holds a lot of water. Im not crazy about the lid. It doesnt open far enough to get water in when you are using a shallow sink. Large hands will not fit in to clean it."

This kettle heats the water super fast! I was tired of heating a large pot of water on the stove while wasting energy so I decided to give this one a shot. The kettle is easy to clean and it looks stylish in my kitchen.

reviews.reviewTitle: Rust Spots - But great customer service
reviews.reviewText: Works great but I have rust spots after a little more than a week.  I use bottled water.  Returning and will not buy again., "I did get contacted (after I already bought a different kettle) by the seller who offered to send me a free replacement in addition to the refund.  Wow!  I declined as I dont need another kettle but will definitely buy from this seller in the future!"
Great electric tea kettle.  Fast boil and very hot.  Love the light when it’s on.  It’s nice way to know it’s on and working.  It’s great for my afternoon tea.  Does not leave a taste in the water.

I have had this for a few days. I used it the last three days and I am astonished how fast it heats the water for my carafe. If it works this good for a long time I will love my purchase ! I recommend this to anyone who loves hot coffee and uses a carafe you have to buy this ! The company is wonderful to work with ! I highly recommend this electric kettle !

I love this kettle. You just fill it with water. Plug it in and put it on the base. It lights up blue while warming up. Once done the light turns off so you know it’s ready. It was so quick and awesome.
Quick heat up and compact makes about 4 cup of teas! Perfect gift

reviews.reviewTitle: Replace your stovetop tea kettle with this
reviews.reviewText: I thought I might miss the traditional tea kettle but was tired of mine leaking all the time. I have been seeing these electric kettles around for awhile & this one looked cool. I absolutely love it! My kids use it for cup o’noodles and hot chocolate. I like it for my chai tea In the morning. It warms up in less than a minute which is convenient!

"Just bought the Mueller electric teakettle and it boils a full pot of water very quickly.  I like that it is glass so that I can see whats happening.  The opening is a little small to reach in and clean it, but I dont expect Ill need to do that very often."

I love it, quicker than my old one I had similar to this from BBand B. Alittle bigger than the one in Target.  I see why this kettle was rated high For 2019. Cool looking too. 👍 you could put a tea bag or two AFTER you boil the water in it. It has a screen at the spout that won’t allow the tea bags to fall into your cup. 😉

Just received the kettle and this thing is super quick. I barely plugged it in and not even 5 mins and the water is already boiling. It also automatically turns off when done. The only minor thing would be the packaging. It just came in the original box, but it all came in tack so not really an issue. Pleasantly surprised how quickly water boils in this.

I absolutely love this electric kettle it boils water in record time and the led light lets you know when the water is ready and boiling. I bought this for my house because my mother in law kept using the microwave to heat up water for her instant coffee and she loves this kettle. It is super easy to use and even easier to clean!
Love love love this!  Heats the water quickly and very easy to use and clean!  Great quality and such a great deal!  Perfect size for travel but big enough to carry enough water!
AAAAAA++++ Thank You Team Mueller !!! Home Run !!

reviews.reviewTitle: The kettle I didn’t know I needed!
reviews.reviewText: I came across this kettle by accident and decided to give it a try. I LOVE IT! It heats up the water very fast and shuts off automatically once the water is boiling, which is great because I’m forgetful. I also don’t have to wonder if I forgot to turn it off once I leave the house because it’s automatic.

It feels solid in my hands, good craftsmanship. Also, it has nice smooth, clean lines, making it an attractive addition to my kitchen. Lastly, I look at appliances in the kitchen as tools. Every item that I utilize in preparation for cooking and baking, is to me, a tool. This kettle is also a tool, one that will serve me in the kitchen for years to come., "One thing that I havent mentioned is the lovely blue light that comes on when you turn the kettle on. The little things in life make a big difference."

"This is a cool looking kettle.  It boils really fast; easily 2x faster than my old electric kettle.  It pours well (my old kettle didnt).  It is relatively easy to fill.  If theres any flaw to the design it is that the lid doesnt open wide, but rather just a few inches."

Great light show the water boils quickly my only complaint is the thickness of the cord compared to the weight of the base. Once you take the kettle off the base the base lifts up. Other than being careful not to put it too close to the edge of a counter I enjoy this pot.

Just purchased this kettle and everything going well at the moment.  The handle is a bit awkward to hold when pouring however.  I have yet to figure out how to give it a thorough cleaning as the top is a little too small, but I am sure I will figure it out.  More later

reviews.reviewTitle: A watched pot never... oh, wait.
reviews.reviewText: "I guess a watched pot does boil. Its so fast and convenient. The smaller the pot of water the faster it boils. A full pot takes about 5 minutes. At the minimum (which I use most to boil water for tea) Ive never even timed it. I just stand there and its done so fast."

reviews.reviewTitle: The LED light is so awesome!
reviews.reviewText: This is actually very cheap in comparison to other water kettles, and it’s just as effective. The water boils so quick which is awesome for a tea-filled winter. Also the blue light is such a cool touch - I love the look of it. I threw it in my dishwasher and was fine!

reviews.reviewTitle: Boils under a minute. Shuts off immediately after
reviews.reviewText: Flavor? Hmm... I like it! It heats my water super fast! I love the pretty blue light. It’s a bit bulky, but no big deal. Super easy to use. It takes like 15 seconds-definitely under one minute-to boil water., It shuts off immediately after my water is hot. Immediately! 😊

Love the ease of use of this and how quickly it boils water. Prior to an electric kettle I was using the stove top one for years. I still like those but I may put it away for this because it heats my water so quickly. I purchased this for my classroom but I definitely want another for my home.

OMGosh, I love this electric kettle!  It is easy to use and has several convenient features: a button releases the lid, led lights dance while the water is heating up, there is an automatic switch off when the water boils, and there is a safety switch off in case the kettle is accidentally turned on when there is no water in the kettle.  The handle is easy grip.  No wonder it was nominated for a design award.

Wow! I love this kettle! I am super happy with this and love the extra long cord. It’s easy to use, you just push a button and in a few seconds you have hot water for your tea or chocolate or whatever you need hot water for.  My daughter wants to take with her to college now!

Total Game Changer!!! I absolutely love my new kettle. I brought it to work and my co-workers love it too. It’s easy to use and fast!! We use it every day. Hot water for tea, soups, or instant coffee. It’s perfect!! I’m so happy I made this purchase. Definitely worth it!!!

reviews.reviewTitle: Looks great and easy to use
reviews.reviewText: I really like the ease of having this water heater. It is super easy and straight forward to use and it looks very nice. I have it ready to go at the office so I can have hot tea or use it for lunches that require hot water. It works quickly and efficiently.

"This is my second Mueller.  Last one died after several years.  Childishly easy to use, very practical.  Can be filled through spout (the way I always do it).  Heats very fast.  Lights up while its heating so you can watch the water start to bubble.", Highly recommended!

Love this kettle. Winter is coming and having water for coffee and tea is essential. I have a an aluminum kettle but felt like it gave it a certain flavor. The glass in this kettle not only makes it look pretty but also does not provide any extra flavors.
I have only used this to boil water but its SOOOOOO freakin quick! When I was tea or a quick soup I use this. Easy to use
So far so good! Makes getting boiling hot water really fast for whatever you may need it for! Love the auto shut off feature too!

reviews.reviewTitle: Easy to use,  easy to clean,  great modern look
reviews.reviewText: "Oh my gosh. This modern tea kettle is so pretty.  I just love watching it light up and bubble.  Its nice,  because i have little kids,  so i like to pull it off before it gets to hot,  this is perfect to see when i need to pull it.  So easy to use,  very easy to clean."

This electric pot is quick to boil and is lightweight even though its glass. The glass allows you to see the boil which is nice if you only need a low boil for tea. The base is easy to set on and take off and the kettle itself is easy to clean.

The top is a push button spring loaded? And sometimes you have to push it a dozen times before it will open and sometimes I can’t open it at all and I have to fill it with the pour spout. I do t know if there have been similar issues? I will probably return it. It does heat quickly but the top is very annoying
This premium kettle is quick and makes it easy for a quick cup of tea. It is extremely well made and easy to use.

What a great kettle! Looks super stylish and expensive, boils water in few minutes even when it’s full! And I love the blue light of it when it’s on! I love to watch the process of the water heating lol. Greatest quality for the price!

"Kettle heats up really fast. Large capacity but you can still choose amount of water you want to put in. Sturdy handle. Love the look of this model,I keep it out on counter when I normally would put things away in cabnets. Best kettle Ive had so far."

reviews.reviewTitle: Stopped working within a few months - not once, but twice.
reviews.reviewText: We have had 2 of these break down in the last 9 months. First one lasted 6 months and the second one stopped working in less than 3 months (it doesn’t even power on now). The lid is extremely flimsy and in both cases the lid broke within a few weeks., Note that the model that we bought was sold by the same seller but using a different link https://www.amazon.com/gp/product/B077J8YQYX/ref=ppx_yo_dt_b_search_asin_title?ie=UTF8&psc=1, Look for yourself, it is essentially the same product that had started receiving bad ratings so the seller decided to rebrand it and added some extra tags. I recommend that you stay away from this poor quality product. Yes, it looks pretty but what’s the point if it doesn’t work. We have experienced this first hand - not once, but twice (in less than 9 months).

This product has far exceeded my expectations though I think it is a bit difficult to clean. A vinegar water boil seems most effective. I have not had an electric kettle before and love the speed and flavor and cordless feature.

Awesome water boiler that makes my water taste amazing. Love how it’s also see through so you can watch your water boil. Boils fairly quick and it’s super convenient. Don’t have to wait for my water to boil on the stove anymore.

reviews.reviewTitle: This is perfect for those hot days!
reviews.reviewText: "This kettle has made me so happy! It doesnt heat up the entire house like turning on the stove,  its like 95 out, so definitely not an option.  We had a boil water advisory this week and I feel better about the heated water then I do the bottled."

This electric kettle replaced one that I had for 10+ years.  I knocked that one off the counter and it shattered.  I am pleased with this glass kettle that is even quicker in heating, has a lovely glow and is very reasonable in price.
